summary: Took the texture made from adam_c_123 and made it a standalone, craftable and non replacer armor. Dragonscale Armor stats, perk required.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is based on adam_c_123 \"[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5100]triss armor re tex dragon hunter[/url]. Permission to use his work has been given. 

[color=red][b]UPDATE 1.01: [/b][/color] thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19425]exeter[/url] permission now UNP bodies are supported. 

I really like the texture but I want to keep the other normal Triss Outfit, so I just made a standalone and craftable version. 
It has the same stats of Dragonscale Armor, and the smithing perk is required to craft it. 

The package contains all the needed meshes and textures, you don\'t need the original one, and it won\'t work either (I had to change the texture paths in the NIF files). 

If you enjoy the mod please take a minute to [b][u]endorse the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5100]original mod[/url][/u][/b]. Thank you. 


[color=red][b]INSTALLATION: [/b][/color]

1. Extract the files in your Skyrim\\Data directory, or use your mod manager of choice
2. Activate the file DragonHunterArmor.esp
3. [OPTIONAL] If you want one of the alternative UNP meshes, extract the files in your Skyrim/Data folder after installing the main file, overwrite/merge when prompted. 



[b]CREDITS[/b]
CDProject RED For \"The Witcher 2\" and its assets.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5135]Fraper[/url] for the vanilla body meshes. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5100]adam_c_123[/url] for the texture. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19425]exeter[/url] for the UNP body meshes.
author: Kitako

files.name: Meshes for UNPB body - No BPP support
